section.section: In accordance with paragraph (2) of this subsection, a principal officer of a licensee shall file a report under oath with the sheriff on the form that the sheriff provides.
A licensee that is issued a license for a period of less than 1 year shall file the report within 15 days after the date that the license expires.

A licensee that is issued a license for a period of 1 year shall file:
a semiannual report on or before January 31 of the licensing year; and
an annual report within 30 days after the date that the license expires.
A licensee also shall keep a weekly report in the form that the sheriff requires.
The weekly report shall be completed under oath.

The weekly report is subject to audit at a reasonable hour by:
the sheriff;
the State's Attorney for the county; or
a representative of the sheriff or the State's Attorney.
